comments:
Build 20020312

I pressed Ctrl+W to open a recently closed editor, and an internal error 
occurred.  I had recently recovered from another crash of the workbench, I don't 
know if that's related.  I can now consistently reproduce the error in my 
workspace, even if I shut down and restart.  My UI setup is a single workbench 
window with three perspectives inside it: java, debug, resources.  The editor 
area was hidden in the resource perspective, but otherwise there were several 
editors open.

Can you still reproduce this problem?
Would you have this workspace around?

Fixed and released.
As a workaround you can delete the file:
  .metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.ui\dialog_settings.xml
